alert.note: Alert for Allegany; Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 20 at 12:51AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF LAKE EFFECT RAIN AND WET SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHAUTAUQUA... CATTARAUGUS...ALLEGANY...SOUTHERN ERIE...AND WYOMING COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of lake effect rain and wet snow. Minor slushy accumulations across higher terrain will produce difficult travel. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1248 AM EDT, a band of lake effect rain and wet snow was found across central and northern Chautauqua County, northern Cattaraugus County, and southern Erie County. This band of lake effect rain will drift north through the wee hours of the morning. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Slushy snow accumulations across the higher terrain including the Boston Hills, Chautauqua Ridge, and ridges of Wyoming County. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Allegany; Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Southern Erie; Wyoming
